name: Stardust Gravity League 2018
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Battle-witches face each other in a dangerous zero gravity arena. They can grab floating objects with their grappling-hand to move around and bump ennemies into walls using their battle-pet. 

Platform : PC
Engine : Unity 
Number of players :2-4

Producer : Maxime BODIN
Game Design : Lucas BLOMME, Ivan LECOMTE
Game Art : Célia DEJOU, Line GRENECHE, Etienne POV
Game Design & Programming : Alexandre FERLET, Rafael GARCIN
Music & Sound Design : Théo LE FLOCH, Luc CLAVEL, Gaétan BARBAULT, Simon LESCHIERA
